Author: swiftfoot_hiker

Comment: At some point, the media has to realize this is exactly what MTG wants.  She receives far more coverage than anyone else in Congress, and it it's playing right into the whole point she's in office: to use that office as a platform to spew her vile ramblings that would otherwise be drowned out by other right-wingers if she wasn't in Congress.  The goal is ultimately to launch a more lucrative career in a higher position, like the Senate, Georgia governor's mansion or most likely, the current administration.  Probably the only reason Trump hasn't appointed her for something yet is because even a lot of the Freedom Caucus can't stand her, and because she's openly challenged some of his actions.  But I would really rather not see her crap continuously amplified in headlines every damn day.
Author: AcrobaticEdge5907

Comment: The entire trans-athlete narratives were just an excuse by MAGA to be bigots and were a political tool by Trump and the GOP to manipulate those bigots into manufactured outrage.   .002% of athletes in the NCAA were trans. Transwomen have competed since the 1977. Nearly 50 years.
